Package gui

Class Summary
AIPanel Panel for setting the artificial intelligence of the local computer player.
AnimationSpeedPanel Panel for adjusting the animation speed.
DimensionsPanel  
DisplayOptionsDialog  
DisplayOptionsPanel  
GamePanel Panel which displays the game board and its game states and where all moves can be set via mouse click.
MainFrame This class represents the main window of the application.
MainMenuBar Class holding all main menus of the application in one main menu bar.
MaxTimePanel Slider Panel for setting a maximal thinking time.
NewGameDialog Dialogue that opens everytime a user wants to start a new game.
PlayerPropertiesPanel Panel for setting player properties.
RemoteServerPanel Panel for setting remote server options.
ServerSettingsDialog Panel for setting local server properties.
ServerSettingsPanel Panel for setting local server options.
